key_risks: Regulatory and legal issues, including SEC fines for compliance violations
Cybersecurity risks due to past data breaches and reliance on third-party vendors
Economic and competitive pressures in the banking sector
Customer complaints affecting reputation and retention
controversies: SEC fine of $325,000 for violating Regulation Best Interest (Reg BI)
$8.73 million data breach settlement related to a 2021 cybersecurity incident
social_issues: Mixed customer satisfaction rating (3.2/5 stars) with service quality complaints
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks in M&A activities
Integration risks from aggressive acquisition strategy

sources.title: First Horizon bank online accounts hacked to steal customers' funds
sources.snippet: First Horizon discovered the attack in mid-April 2021 and said that it only impacted a limited number of customers. As discovered during the investigation, the unknown threat actors could breach the customers' online bank accounts using previously stolen credentials and by exploiting a vulnerability in third-party software.
